<!-- wp:paragraph {"style":{"color":{"text":"#6c7781"},"typography":{"fontSize":17}}} -->
<p class="has-text-color" style="color:#6c7781;font-size:17px"><em>It’s a whole new way to use WordPress. Try it right here!</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left">We call the new editor Gutenberg. The entire editing experience has been rebuilt for media rich pages and posts. Experience the flexibility that blocks will bring, whether you are building your first site, or write code for a living.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:gallery {"columns":4,"linkTo":"none","align":"wide","className":"gutenberg-landing\u002d\u002dfeatures-grid"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-gallery alignwide has-nested-images columns-4 is-cropped gutenberg-landing--features-grid"><!-- wp:image {"id":110878,"linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/plugins-2.gif" alt="" class="wp-image-110878"/><figcaption>Do more with fewer plugins.</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110875,"linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/layouts-1.gif" alt="" class="wp-image-110875"/><figcaption>Create modern, multimedia-heavy layouts.</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110879,"linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/screens-2.gif" alt="" class="wp-image-110879"/><figcaption>Work across all screen sizes and devices.</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110881,"linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/looks-4.gif" alt="" class="wp-image-110881"/><figcaption>Trust that your editor looks like your website.</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></figure>
<!-- /wp:gallery -->

<!-- wp:spacer -->
<div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:wporg/download-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-download-button wp-block-button aligncenter"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-background has-strong-blue-background-color" href="https://wordpress.org/download/" style="color:#fff">Try it Today in WordPress</a></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/download-button -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","className":"gutenberg-landing\u002d\u002dbutton-disclaimer","fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center gutenberg-landing--button-disclaimer has-small-font-size"><em>Gutenberg is available as part of WordPress 5.0 and later. The <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/classic-editor/">Classic Editor</a> plugin allows users to switch back to the previous editor if needed. Future development will continue in the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/gutenberg/">Gutenberg</a> plugin.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer -->
<div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left"} -->
<h2 class="has-text-align-left">Meet your new best friends, Blocks</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left">Blocks are a great new tool for building engaging content. With blocks, you can insert, rearrange, and style multimedia content with very little technical knowledge. Instead of using custom code, you can add a block and focus on your content.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110882,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/blocks.gif" alt="" class="wp-image-110882"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left">Without being an expert developer, you can build your own custom posts and pages. Here’s a selection of the default blocks included with Gutenberg:</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:gallery {"columns":8,"linkTo":"none","align":"full"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-gallery alignfull has-nested-images columns-8 is-cropped"><!-- wp:image {"id":110883,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Paragraph.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110883"/><figcaption>Paragraph</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110884,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Heading.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110884"/><figcaption>Heading</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110885,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Media-text.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110885"/><figcaption>Media &amp; Text</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110886,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Quote.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110886"/><figcaption>Quote</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110887,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Image.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110887"/><figcaption>Image</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110888,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Gallery.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110888"/><figcaption>Gallery</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110889,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Cover-image.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110889"/><figcaption>Cover Image</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110890,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Video.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110890"/><figcaption>Video</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110891,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Audio.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110891"/><figcaption>Audio</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110892,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Columns.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110892"/><figcaption>Columns</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110893,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-File.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110893"/><figcaption>File</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110894,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Code.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110894"/><figcaption>Code</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110895,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-List.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110895"/><figcaption>List</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110896,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Button.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110896"/><figcaption>Button</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110897,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-Embeds.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110897"/><figcaption>Embeds</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110898,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/Icon_-More.png" alt="" class="wp-image-110898"/><figcaption>More</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></figure>
<!-- /wp:gallery -->

<!-- wp:spacer -->
<div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left"} -->
<h2 class="has-text-align-left">Be your own builder</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left">A single block is nice—reliable, clear, distinct. Discover the flexibility to use media and content, side by side, driven by your vision.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":110905,"sizeSlug":"large"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://wordpress.org/gutenberg/files/2020/08/builder3.gif" alt="" class="wp-image-110905"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:spacer -->
<div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left"} -->
<h2 class="has-text-align-left">Gutenberg ❤️ Developers</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:columns {"className":"has-2-columns gutenberg-landing\u002d\u002ddevelopers-columns"} -->
<div class="wp-block-columns has-2-columns gutenberg-landing--developers-columns"><!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left"><strong>Built with modern technology.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left">Gutenberg was developed on GitHub using the WordPress REST API, JavaScript, and React.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-small-font-size"><a href="https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/key-concepts/">Learn more</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column -->

<!-- wp:column -->
<div class="wp-block-column"><!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left"><strong>Designed for compatibility.</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left">We recommend migrating features to blocks, but support for existing WordPress functionality remains. There will be transition paths for shortcodes, meta-boxes, and Custom Post Types.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left","fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left has-small-font-size"><a href="https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/contributors/faq/">Learn more</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div>
<!-- /wp:column --></div>
<!-- /wp:columns -->

<!-- wp:spacer -->
<div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left"} -->
<h2 class="has-text-align-left">The editor is just the beginning</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"left"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-left">Gutenberg is more than an editor. It’s also the foundation that’ll revolutionize customization and site building in WordPress.</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:quote {"align":"left","className":" is-style-large"} -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote has-text-align-left is-style-large"><p>"This will make running your own blog a viable alternative again."</p><cite>— <a href="https://twitter.com/azumbrunnen_/status/1019347243084800005">Adrian Zumbrunnen</a></cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:quote {"align":"left","className":" is-style-large"} -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote has-text-align-left is-style-large"><p>"The web up until this point has been confined to some sort of rectangular screen. But that is not how it’s going to be. Gutenberg has the potential of moving us into the next time."</p><cite>— <a href="https://wordpress.tv/2017/12/10/morten-rand-hendriksen-gutenberg-and-the-wordpress-of-tomorrow/">Morten Rand-Hendriksen</a></cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:quote {"align":"left","className":" is-style-large"} -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote has-text-align-left is-style-large"><p>"The Gutenberg editor has some great assets that could genuinely help people to write better texts."</p><cite>— <a href="https://yoast.com/writing-with-gutenberg/">Marieke van de Rakt</a></cite></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:spacer -->
<div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:wporg/download-button -->
<div class="wp-block-wporg-download-button wp-block-button aligncenter"><a class="wp-block-button__link has-background has-strong-blue-background-color" href="https://wordpress.org/download/" style="color:#fff">Try it Today in WordPress</a></div>
<!-- /wp:wporg/download-button -->

<!-- wp:paragraph {"align":"center","className":"gutenberg-landing\u002d\u002dbutton-disclaimer","fontSize":"small"} -->
<p class="has-text-align-center gutenberg-landing--button-disclaimer has-small-font-size"><em>Gutenberg is available as part of WordPress 5.0 and later. The <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/classic-editor/">Classic Editor</a> plugin allows users to switch back to the previous editor if needed. Future development will continue in the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/gutenberg/">Gutenberg</a> plugin.</em></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:spacer -->
<div style="height:100px" aria-hidden="true" class="wp-block-spacer"></div>
<!-- /wp:spacer -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left"} -->
<h2 class="has-text-align-left">Dig in deeper</h2>

<!-- /wp:list -->
